Recent updates View all (6)

November 2

Deathmatch mode, local multiplayer and visual upgrade!

This update adds completely new game mode: Deathmatch, where your goal is to kill other players and don't get eaten by zombies, as well as several other features such as:
- Local mulitplayer
- A new barricade type "Propane Tank Barricade"
- Reworked barricades, turrets and background visuals
- Ping indicator

Hope you're going to enjoy the update, especially the Deathmatch mode!

25 comments Read more

About This Game

Yet Another Zombie Defense is all about defending yourself against hordes of undead attacking you every night. However, when you're the only survivor struggling against waves of enemies who are getting stronger and stronger, your end is inevitable. The only important question is how long can YOU survive?

The game is a top-down arcade zombie shooter with strategy elements. You're able to choose from variety of weapons to mount them onto auto turrets and set up defensive barricades to stay alive as long as you can. It's for gamers who like to put their skills to the test, find optimal strategy, and reach the highest spot on leaderboards! It also features online co-op mode, where you can blast zombies with up to three friends!
READ MORE

System Requirements

    Minimum:
    • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/Win 7/Win 8
    • Processor: 2.0Ghz
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 compatible
    • DirectX: Version 9.0c
    • Hard Drive: 50 MB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

Was this review helpful? Yes No Funny
31 of 38 people (82%) found this review helpful
1
Artozis
778 products in account
43 reviews
Recommended
0.9 hrs on record
Posted: September 6
Amazing Zombie Defense it is interesting indie project Developed by Awesome Games Studio. The game is a shooter with a view from the top where our main task is to survive at any cost. Also, there is not any of storyline. After playing a couple of hours Amazing Zombie Defense left mixed feelings.

On the one hand there is only one map, only a few kinds of barricades, the same type of the dead, and of course in the center stands a lantern which begins in a few hours a little bit annoying. On the other hand, there are 2 modes, each of which has its own interest. Very pleased that there is a coop. mode, and survive with your friends still more fun than one. Also, for the game with one map there is a large arsenal of weapons, oh yes still present turret.

Yet Another Zombie Defense takes its simplicity. In a couple of hours, evenings it is enough no more. Of course, you can try to conquer the ratings of Steam, but I gave up the idea. The game is not really distinguished, than other indie - projects. Developers should consider the introduction of Steam Workshop it will be a big plus. The community has always been a joy to create a variety of maps, modifications, weapons, etc. Achievements made very quickly just a few hours.
Regarding graphics, I can say that for this game, it is acceptable. Sure, I would like to present a variety of special effects, such as when a zombie steps a mine. I would like to have a live animation of the character, not a walking beam in clothes.

Summarizing Yet Another Zombie Defense is certainly not a masterpiece. But, it’s probably worth it. And, on sale it receives a 90% discount.

Pros:
Survival
The gameplay is good
Scurry around the pole
Multiplayer

Cons:
Graphics
Music
Zombie dumber than cork

Total 6/10

If you like this review, you can read more in our group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/SpecialGamesClub#curation
